title: STAT+: With a grin — and tight lips — Revolution Medicines’ CEO faces questions about acquisition
description: Investors poured into a room at #JPM26 to see how Revolution Medicines' CEO would dance around questions they knew he probably wasn’t going to answer. He did well.
content: Investors poured into a room at #JPM26 to see how Revolution Medicines' CEO would dance around questions they knew he probably wasn’t going to answer. He did well.
